com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.bdb

Class BDBNodeStateStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.NodeStateStore
      • com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.bdb.BDBNodeStateStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StartAndStoppable

    public class BDBNodeStateStore
extends NodeStateStore
    Concrete NodeStateStore implementation that uses BDB-JE as the backing storage.
